title: Bug 8142: No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: Bug 8142: No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects. I don't understand it.
OB: There is an issue with the scoped type hierarchy feature on binary projects.
EB: The scoped type hierarchy should be available and functional on binary projects.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a binary project.
2. Select a file within the project.
3. Press the F4 key to access the scoped type hierarchy.
4. Note that the scoped type hierarchy is not displayed or accessible.
